content.rendered:
Supervisor/Medical Accounts Receivable | Tulsa, OK   Supervisor/Medical Accounts Receivable Responsibilities:
  • Perform supervisory oversight to team members regarding account resolution
  • Insurance processing
  • Payment deposits and posting
  • Overpayment processing
  • Charge corrections
  • Document imaging and retrieval to ensure maximization of cash flow and minimization of A/R days
  • Perform supervisory oversight as related to disciplinary action and coaching
  • Monitor daily cash deposits and payment postings to be completed within the allotted timeframe
  • Prepare staff schedules and coordinates coverage to ensure appropriate staffing levels for daily work load
  • Approve and monitor time off requests
  • Maintain attendance records
  • Enter and approve work hours in the timekeeping system
  • Ensure successful completion of new staff training and performance audits for all staff
  Supervisor/Medical Accounts Receivable Requirements:
  • Must have medical background
  • Must be able to read an EOB
